Class Farbenverwalter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Farbenverwalter

  • public class Farbenverwalter
extends java.lang.Object
    A Farbenverwalter is the color administrator. A Farbenverwalter changes and sets the color of every form.
    Author:
    Philippe Krüttli
